mapper.insert: insert into Book(bookId, bookName, price, author, buyDate, publish, bookLend, img, bookSketch, place) VALUES (#{bookId}, #{bookName}, #{price}, #{author}, #{buyDate}, #{publish}, #{bookLend}, #{img}, #{bookSketch}, #{place})
mapper.update: update Book set bookName =#{bookName}, price = #{price}, author = #{author}, buyDate = #{buyDate}, publish = #{publish}, bookLend = #{bookLend}, img = #{img}, bookSketch = #{bookSketch}, place = #{place} where bookId = #{bookId}
mapper.insert: insert into Borrow (readerId, bookId, borrowDate, returnDate) VALUES (#{readerId}, #{bookId}, #{borrowDate}, #{returnDate})
mapper.delete: DELETE from Borrow where readerId = #{readerId} and bookId = #{bookId}
mapper.update: update Reader set status = 1 where readerId = #{value}
update Reader set status = 0 where readerId = #{value}
mapper.select: SELECT bookId FROM Book order by bookId desc limit 1
